channel.title: Yeah it was. (math)
channel.description:
105 is 5/6th of a number, what is the number?
105/5 = 21
21 * 6 = 126
6/6th = 126
It is, so far I am 100%, only 2 more certifys then the test. and im caught up til October 1st. whew

item.title: Yeah it was. (math)
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

llcoolchris:

Who cares? This is an online forum, who gives a fucking shit? I asked for help then after a bit I figured it out myself, get lives people. This will be my last reply on this topic. go ahead and flame. a mod will eventually lock

HEY! You can cut that stuff out right now. Get a better attitude.

Read full topic

Im in university doing a masters in physics and a bachelors in maths and environmental engineering but sure, an iq of 2.

item.title: Yeah it was. (math)
item.dc:creator: @llcoolchris llcoolchris
item.description:
@llcoolchris wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:6, topic:459567”][quote author=llcoolchris link=topic=562487.msg4102063#msg4102063 date=1347604442]

Where’s the help part?

the “yeah it was” meaning i figured it out by myself
[/quote]
So why did you post in the homework help section if you’d already figured it out? [/quote]

AndI am guessing you have an iq of 2? I changed the title to that. before that it said I needed help with it. wow lol. Just in general what would make the most sense? only one option really: I needed help to see if I was right, but then I figured it out by myself so i changed the title to “yeah i was” stating yeah i was right. lol jesus. just use your head.
